墋字的基本解释

墋
chěn
沙土。
混浊不清：“芒芒宇宙，上墋下黩。”
食品中混入沙土。

墋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chěn］
［《廣韻》初朕切，上寑，初。］
(1)沙土。
(2)食物中混入沙土。
(3)混浊。

墋字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墋； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第31
【廣韻】初朕切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】楚錦切，?音磣。沙土也。【沈約·郊居賦】寧方割于下土，廓重氛于上墋。　又混沌，不淸澄貌。【陸機·漢功臣贊】茫茫宇宙，上墋下黷。　凡慘黷，?當作墋黷，見【英華辨証】。

墋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
墋字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
chěn
Sandy soil.
Muddy and unclear: "Mangmang universe, go up and down."
Sand is mixed with food.
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chěn]
["Guangyun" Chu Zhen cut, Shang Yu, Chu. ]
(1) Sandy soil.
(2) Sand is mixed into the food.
(3) Turbidity.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　墋; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 237 31
[Guang Yun] Chu Zhen cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Chu Jin cut,? Yin Su. Sand also. [Shen Yue·Jiaoju Fu] Ning Fang was cut on the lower soil, and the outline was heavy on the top.　It's chaotic again, and it's not clear. [Praise of Lu Ji·Han Heroes] The vast universe, go up and down.　Who is miserable,? Treat it as a mess, see [Yinghua Dialectics].
